item.title: 99 Stats 126 Cmb TuT
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

there is, i forgot which page right now. but you can search for.

[code]public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code]

now where it says 135 change to 99, but there is something else your supposed to do, with the 300.0 but i forgot =/ sorry

search for it in your client.java

these two parts mainly where the 135 is:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {

and:

} } return 135; }

change the 135 to 99.

Read full topic
